title: My phone started rebooting once and again until the battery was dead. I can't do anything.
content: On saturday as of nowhere (it dind't fell or something alike) my phone started rebooting once and again until the battery was dead. I waited for two days to charge it and right now I cherged it and the phone continued to reboot until the battery was dead again. I don't know what to do, it is impossible to make a hard reset because the ohne never get's there.
